r/HelpMeFind on Reddit: HFM: A replacement for Reach unwaxed floss. I think Johnson & Johnson has stopped making it. It's relatively thick compared to other (store) brands I've tried.
s: January 12, 2017 - I have tried a few other brands. They all seem thinner than Reach unwaxed. That eBay listing and others like it tend to confirm my suspicion that J&J isn't making this any more. The lister wants $12.50 for a single container. That's a really high price for a single container of dental floss. ... Ha. Good catch. ... https://m.bedbathandbeyond.com/m/product/johnson...
